channel.title: Pop Clip Extension now available for Drafts 5
channel.description:
Upon my request Pilotmoon software made a Drafts 5 Pop Clip Extension available. GREAT. I use it frequently and can recommend it very much.
https://pilotmoon.com/popclip/extensions/

item.title: Pop Clip Extension now available for Drafts 5
item.dc:creator: gushin
item.description:
Wow. Just saw this and added the PopClip extension. Brilliant.

Read full topic
item.source: Pop Clip Extension now available for Drafts 5

item.title: Pop Clip Extension now available for Drafts 5
item.dc:creator: martinpacker
item.description:
And I’ve just installed it. So I’m happy, too.

The one issue with PopClip is not all text selection interactions trigger it. But I think I should take that up with PilotMoon.

Read full topic
